attributes.action: Make Sir David Attenborough the new face of the £20 note
attributes.background: David Attenborough is a national treasure that needs to be remembered & celebrated for years to come. People petitioned for Jane Austin to be the £10 note so why not Dave. He’s graced our TVs and educates everyone on environmental issues. God knows where we’d be without him!

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
